briefTitle: Administration of Ketamine to Prevent the Post-operative Pain

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:

* with surgery of breast cancer (mastectomy or tumorectomy)

outcomeMeasures.title: Morphine Consumption (First 48 Post-operative Hours)
outcomeMeasures.description: Proportion of subjects with at least one consumption of morphine within 48 hours following surgery.

outcomeMeasures.title: Proportion of Subjects With Post-operative Pain
outcomeMeasures.description: Pain was measured using a Visual Analog Rating Scale (VAS), ranging from 0 (no pain) to 10 (pain). VAS score \>= 4 was considered as "Pain". VAS sore \<4 was considered as "Pain".
